data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
In the minute 2, Goal! Yuji Senuma gives Yokohama FC a 0-1 lead in Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 3, Kento Misao (Kashima) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 5, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 6, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 9, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yokohama FC's Yusuke Minagawa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 13, Yusuke Matsuo puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima just outside Yokohama FC's area.

Yokohama FC are coming forward and Yuji Senuma gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.

Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 21, Kashima pushes forward through Ryuji Izumi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 24, Everaldo's header is off-target for Kashima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 27, Yusuke Matsuo of Yokohama FC smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima surge into the attack at Kashima Soccer Stadium but Ryuji Izumiâ€™s header is off-target.

In the minute 31, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shoma Doi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashima.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Yokohama FC throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 36, Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Important block from the Kashima defence as Yutaro Hakamata fires in a strike for Yokohama FC.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 36, At Kashima Soccer Stadium, Kei Koizumi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Maguinho (Yokohama FC) has hit the post with a header.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 40, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
In Kashima Yokohama FC attack through Reo Yasunaga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Ryuji Izumi for the home team is judged to be offside.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Kashima Soccer Stadium.

Yuichi Nishimura awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.

In the minute 58, Ryotaro Araki is replacing Shoma Doi for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Zago (Kashima) is making a third substitution, with Ayase Ueda replacing Leo Silva.
Kashima are back in the match in Kashima. Everaldo has scored to make it 1-2.

Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Kashima.

Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.

Yuichi Nishimura awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 68, Zago is making the team's fourth substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Ryota Nagaki replacing Katsuya Nagato.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 69, Kento Misao (Kashima) has received a first yellow card.
The away team replace Kohei Tezuka with Tatsuki Seko.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Takahiro Shimotaira is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Kazunari Ichimi replacing Yusuke Minagawa.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Takuya Matsuura with Kosuke Saito. This is the third substitution made today by Takahiro Shimotaira.
Kazunari Ichimi of Yokohama FC is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.

Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Yokohama FC's half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Zago (Kashima) is making a fifth substitution, with Yuta Matsumura replacing Juan Alano.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Kashima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
In Kashima, Kashima push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 81, Koki Saito is replacing Yusuke Matsuo for Yokohama FC at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Kashima's Kento Misao misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 83, Yuichi Nishimura awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 85, Kashima to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yuji Senuma for Yokohama FC who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 87, Yuji Senuma (Yokohama FC) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Masakazu Tashiro.
Kashima push forward at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Everaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Yokohama FC defence.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 88, Goal! Ryotaro Araki equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima's Everaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Everaldo (Kashima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Kashima. The final score is 3-2.
Kashima take a 3-2 lead thanks to Kei Koizumi.
That's a fine assist from Ayase Ueda.
